| Question              	| Answer                                         	|
|-----------------------	|------------------------------------------------	|
| Driving Question      	| How can [technology] support [knowledge work]? 	|
| Tentative Answer      	|                                                	|
| Deliverable Prototype 	| (e.g. software utility, web service, etc.)     	|
| Approximate Timeline  	|                                                	|
| Required Resources    	| (e.g. expertise, compute, etc.)                	|
